attributes.background: On 1st May 2019 Parliament voted and declared a climate crisis. To date, the government has failed to act, or failed to act sufficiently. We now need immediate and large scale changes into legislation and infrastructure in order to lead the way in the struggle against climate change.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about climate change, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might like to sign one of these petitions: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/268785
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/261048
